General.Name: C&G Hi Tech Co.Ltd
General.Description: C&G Hi Tech Co., Ltd. engages in the semiconductor/FPD/component, materials, and environment businesses in South Korea and internationally. It offers semiconductor devices, including chemical dispense systems, chemical blending systems, developer dilution, NH4OH, and HF dilution; display products, including developer purification and filtration systems and DDS-11; and components, including APV sheets, PFA GB sheets, daikin new PTEE GB sheets, PFA resins, PTEE powders, CPT resins, and bubble captures. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Anseong, South Korea.
